governing_law.clause_text: This Agreement and all Proceedings (whether based in contract, tort or otherwise) arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the actions of Parent, Merger Sub or the Company in the negotiation, administration, performance and enforcement hereof, shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the Laws of the State of Delaware, without giving effect to any choice or conflict of laws provision or rule (whether of the State of Delaware or any other jurisdiction) that would cause the application of the Laws of any jurisdiction other than the State of Delaware, except that, notwithstanding the foregoing, subject in all respects to the provisions of any other agreement (including the Debt Letters or any definitive agreement relating to the Financing) between any Financing Source Party and any party hereto, all matters relating to any action or claim against any Financing Source Party, and all matters relating to the interpretation, construction, validity and enforcement (whether at law, in equity, in contract, in tort, or otherwise) against any of the Financing Source Parties in anyway relating to the Debt Letters or the performance thereof or the Financing, shall be exclusively governed by, and construed in accordance with, the Laws of the State of New York.
governing_law.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.10 Governing Law

governing_law.clause_text: This Agreement and all Proceedings (whether based in contract, tort or otherwise) arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the actions of Parent, Merger Sub or the Company in the negotiation, administration, performance and enforcement hereof, shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the Laws of the State of Delaware, without giving effect to any choice or conflict of laws provision or rule (whether of the State of Delaware or any other jurisdiction) that would cause the application of the Laws of any jurisdiction other than the State of Delaware...
governing_law.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.10 Governing Law

financing_jurisdiction.reason: The agreement specifies that disputes related to the Financing or the performance thereof must be brought in state or Federal court sitting in the county of New York.
financing_jurisdiction.clause_text: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, each party agrees that it will not bring or support any action, cause of action, claim, cross-claim or third-party claim of any kind or description, whether in law or in equity, whether in contract or in tort or otherwise, against the Financing Source Parties in any way relating to this Agreement or any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, including any dispute arising out of or relating in any way to the Financing or the performance thereof, in any forum other than any state or Federal court sitting in the county of New York.
financing_jurisdiction.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.12 Consent to Jurisdiction > (c)

financing_jurisdiction.reason: The document explicitly states that all matters relating to any action or claim against any Financing Source Party, and all matters relating to the interpretation, construction, validity and enforcement against any of the Financing Source Parties in any way relating to the Debt Letters or the performance thereof or the Financing, shall be exclusively governed by the Laws of the State of New York.
financing_jurisdiction.clause_text: all matters relating to any action or claim against any Financing Source Party, and all matters relating to the interpretation, construction, validity and enforcement (whether at law, in equity, in contract, in tort, or otherwise) against any of the Financing Source Parties in anyway relating to the Debt Letters or the performance thereof or the Financing, shall be exclusively governed by, and construed in accordance with, the Laws of the State of New York.
financing_jurisdiction.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.10 Governing Law

exclusive_forum_clause.reason: The agreement includes an exclusive forum clause specifying that disputes must be brought in the Delaware Court of Chancery or other courts in Delaware.
exclusive_forum_clause.clause_text: Each of the parties hereto hereby, with respect to any legal claim or Proceeding arising out of this Agreement or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, (i) expressly and irrevocably submits, for itself and with respect to its property, generally and unconditionally, to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Delaware Court of Chancery and any appellate court therefrom within the State of Delaware (or, if the Delaware Court of Chancery declines to accept jurisdiction over a particular matter, any state or federal court within the State of Delaware), (ii) agrees that it will not attempt to deny or defeat such personal jurisdiction by motion or other request for leave from any such courts, (iii) agrees that it will not bring any claim or Proceeding relating to this Agreement or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement except in such courts...
exclusive_forum_clause.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.12 Consent to Jurisdiction > (a)

exclusive_forum_clause.reason: The document explicitly states that the parties submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Delaware Court of Chancery for any legal claim or proceeding arising out of the agreement.
exclusive_forum_clause.clause_text: (a) Each of the parties hereto hereby, with respect to any legal claim or Proceeding arising out of this Agreement or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, (i) expressly and irrevocably submits, for itself and with respect to its property, generally and unconditionally, to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Delaware Court of Chancery and any appellate court therefrom within the State of Delaware (or, if the Delaware Court of Chancery declines to accept jurisdiction over a particular matter, any state or federal court within the State of Delaware),
exclusive_forum_clause.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.12 Consent to Jurisdiction > (a) > (i)

financing_commitment_enforcement_venue.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.12 Consent to Jurisdiction > (c)

financing_commitment_enforcement_venue.answer: any state or Federal court sitting in the county of New York
financing_commitment_enforcement_venue.reason: The document specifies that actions against Financing Source Parties related to the agreement or transactions, including disputes related to the Financing, must be brought in New York courts.

split_venue_clause.reason: The agreement specifies that disputes related to the Financing Source Parties are to be brought exclusively in New York courts, while other disputes are to be brought in Delaware courts, indicating a split in jurisdiction.
split_venue_clause.clause_text: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, each party agrees that it will not bring or support any action, cause of action, claim, cross-claim or third-party claim of any kind or description, whether in law or in equity, whether in contract or in tort or otherwise, against the Financing Source Parties in any way relating to this Agreement or any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, including any dispute arising out of or relating in any way to the Financing or the performance thereof, in any forum other than any state or Federal court sitting in the county of New York.
split_venue_clause.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.12 Consent to Jurisdiction > (c)

split_venue_clause.answer: general in Delaware, financing in New York
split_venue_clause.reason: The document specifies that general legal claims are subject to Delaware jurisdiction, while claims related to financing are subject to New York jurisdiction.
split_venue_clause.clause_text: (a) Each of the parties hereto hereby, with respect to any legal claim or Proceeding arising out of this Agreement or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, (i) expressly and irrevocably submits, for itself and with respect to its property, generally and unconditionally, to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Delaware Court of Chancery... (c) Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, each party agrees that it will not bring or support any action... against the Financing Source Parties... in any forum other than any state or Federal court sitting in the county of New York.
split_venue_clause.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.12 Consent to Jurisdiction > (a) and (c)

jury_trial_waiver.clause_text: EACH OF PARENT, MERGER SUB AND THE COMPANY HEREBY IRREVOCABLY WAIVES ALL RIGHT TO TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY ACTION, PROCEEDING OR COUNTERCLAIM (WHETHER BASED IN CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE) BETWEEN THEM ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE ACTIONS OF PARENT, MERGER SUB OR THE COMPANY IN THE NEGOTIATION, ADMINISTRATION, PERFORMANCE AND ENFORCEMENT HEREOF (INCLUDING ANY ACTION OR PROCEEDING AGAINST THE FINANCING SOURCE PARTIES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED HEREBY, THE FINANCING OR THE PERFORMANCE OF SERVICES WITH RESPECT THERETO).
jury_trial_waiver.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.14 WAIVER OF JURY TRIAL

ancillary_agreement_governing_law.reason: The main agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, but matters relating to the Financing Source Parties are governed by the laws of the State of New York.
ancillary_agreement_governing_law.clause_text: This Agreement and all Proceedings ... shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the Laws of the State of Delaware ... except that ... all matters relating to any action or claim against any Financing Source Party ... shall be exclusively governed by, and construed in accordance with, the Laws of the State of New York.
ancillary_agreement_governing_law.reference_section: ARTICLE Article VIII GENERAL PROVISIONS > Section 8.10 Governing Law
